# External Audit Services for the Berlin Embassy

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 25-266539
* **Solicitation Title**: NPP - PASS - External Audit Services
* **Solicitation Type**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Publication Date**: July 3, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 19, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 5, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2024

## Background Information

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires an external audit services to verify the financial arrangements supporting the management of a Public Private Partnership (P3) type arrangement for the Embassy of Canada in Berlin.

The audit will cover a period of 20 weeks and will involve a multi-scope audit of financial statements for the last 19 years. Additionally, a restructuration of the historical financial evolution and actual performance of the rents based on the Developer's financial reports and statements since 2005 is required.

## Requirements

The contractor will be required to provide audit services to verify the status of the financial arrangements supporting the Agreement every 5 years during the period of the "Heritable Building Right Agreement" (HBRA).
